channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed

item.description: Pete Buttigieg on why Silicon Valley billionaires are backing Trump: "These are very rich men who have decided to back the Republican party that tends to do good things for very rich men."

item.description: It’s fun to dream of the super-Democrat, the candidate who would totally clean Trump's clock, win in a landslide, and when they take office would clear out the junk on the Supreme Court, bring back Roe v Wade, slam the brakes on climate change, and…
item.source:markdown: It’s fun to dream of the super-Democrat, the candidate who would totally clean Trump's clock, win in a landslide, and when they take office would clear out the junk on the Supreme Court, bring back Roe v Wade, slam the brakes on climate change, and…

item.description: Like it or not, Twitter is still the social web of record. This is something we need to fix. It's going to take a long time, but it has to start.
item.source:markdown: Like it or not, Twitter is still the social web of record. This is something we need to fix. It's going to take a long time, but it has to start.

item.description: We need a well done shadow site for Project 2025, one that does what the Republican site does. This doesn't have to wait for the Dems to decide on a candidate. It's an emergency project for Newmark and/or Knight to fund.
item.source:markdown: We need a well done shadow site for Project 2025, one that does what the Republican site does. This doesn't have to wait for the Dems to decide on a candidate. It's an emergency project for Newmark and/or Knight to fund.

item.description: Even if I were in favor of Biden resigning, I'd never let the NYT quote me. What they're doing is horrific, I wouldn't want to be associated with it.
item.source:markdown: Even if I were in favor of Biden resigning, I'd never let the NYT quote me. What they're doing is horrific, I wouldn't want to be associated with it.

item.description: Today's NYT Daily podcast is really informative, even though the title sounds like it's going to be a puff piece for Trump. It's not. It's realistic. And the interviews with Trump supporters sound like people who could be convinced to vote for Biden.
item.source:markdown: Today's NYT Daily podcast is really informative, even though the title sounds like it's going to be a puff piece for Trump. It's not. It's realistic. And the interviews with Trump supporters sound like people who could be convinced to vote for Biden.

item.description: Outcast upgrade notes: "Playback begins after the download completes, not after a portion of it is buffered." That was the initial design of podcasting, and its justification, at a time when networks were comparatively much slower.

item.description: AOC had a simple message for an unnamed senior Democrat who reportedly said the party had “resigned ourselves” to a second Trump presidency: “Retire.”
